summary: Provides a suite of quick unit tests for the inpainting super‑resolution pipeline, checking dummy component integration, forward passes with attention slicing, batch inference consistency, model serialization in various formats, and compatibility with optimized attention implementations.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and performance of the inpainting super‑resolution model in production pipelines by validating core functionality, memory‑efficient attention, batch handling, and save/load capabilities during continuous integration.
